TopicTitle: Texture Replacer Mod: Attach a custom suit / head to a single Kerbal.

Articles.Content:
I'm working on a project that requires a specific head / suit combo attached to the same Kerbal throughout the entire mission, my problem being that he shares space with a crew and sometimes the mod applies the custom textures to random Kerbals.

I need the same guy looking the same always.
